text: Liu Xirong (born 1 November 1969) is a Chinese rower. She competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese female rowers Category:Olympic rowers of China Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in rowing Category:Rowers at the 1990 Asian Games Category:Rowers at the 1994 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China Category:Medalists at the 1990 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1994 Asian Games Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for China
title: Liu Xirong
